pages.text: A large teal key, similar to those you find in difficult trial chambers.$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Has an extra level of Looting. Light and Thief players will also steal some luck from their opponents.
Combine a $(l:extrastuck:weapons/key_of_trials)key of trials$(/l) and an ominous trial key or an ominous bottle in a totem lathe.
